ygData.subject: Come on ppl.....Give Verant the benefit of the doubt!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have been playing this game since beta phase 4 and I have found that this game is NOTHING like UO.....in UO there were a very many unuseable and
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>
>
>No, the spell is worthless from what ive noticed.



I have been playing this game since beta phase 4 and I have
found that this game is NOTHING like UO.....in UO there were a very many
unuseable and WORTHLESS spells and skills......BUT THIS IS NOT
UO!!!>......and Verant has been VERY good about making sure that EVERYTHING
in this game is WORTH something!!.....even as a Necromancer....there is a
spell called Vampyric Embrace.....everyone in beta and still today in
release thinks that this spell is broken becuase it doesnt work.....but it
turns out that the spell DOES work its just that you cant wield a weapon
while your using that spell......so you must cast it and then disarm
yourself so that you may TOUCH your opponent......so my point is that just
cuase YOU (not you as in Keith....sorry bro....but YOU as in the populous)
arent seeing how it is effecting your char doesnt mean that its
worthless......Verant and the EQ ppl have PROVED time and again that
EVERYTHING in Norath so far is of SOME use......and is WORTH
something.....so keep trying and Im sure well get something soon.......on
the other hand ....it might just be BROKEN.....in which case if you bug it
enuf it will be fixed.......dont just rant guys.....you have to tell sumone
when sumthin is wrong.....



Dymond of E'ci
